text: Hi <@U2H3TT8F2>! This is super exciting. We have a few questions but the "email hackathon manager" button isn't working for us. Do you know who I could reach out to?

Hey Chiara! What error do you run into when clicking the link (it should open as its a standard `mailto:-----` link). You can also feel free to post you questions to this <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> channel or just DM them to me :slightly_smiling_face:
